text: The Premier Volleyball League conference results present the final rankings of each conference in the Philippine Premier Volleyball League, formerly known as Shakey's V-League. The men's division became the Spikers' Turf in 2015 and later joined force to the Premier Volleyball League. ==Women's Division== ===Results=== {| class="wikitable" style="font-size:90%;" !
